thought: The Slack action (action_2) is failing because the params are not set. From the previous comments, the Slack action requires specific params including 'select', 'channelId', 'messageType', and 'text' with proper expression syntax. I need to set these params correctly to send messages to the 'general' channel.
plan: Set params for action_2 with 'select' as 'channel'.
Set 'channelId' mode to 'name' and value to 'general' (channel name).
Set 'text' to '={{$json["text"]}}' to extract the message text from input_data.
Test the Slack action to confirm messages are sent successfully.
criticism: Currently, the Slack action params are empty, causing the workflow execution failure. Proper params are mandatory for the Slack message posting to work.

tool_input.comments: Send the results of the SQL query execution to Slack channel 'general'. Set channel and message text properly.
